name: grid folks
description:
Try the mobile version if the above doesn't work on your phone. Instructions:

  • Use arrow keys to move.
  • Press X to switch heroes.
  • Bump enemies to attack.
  • Stand on two colored squares to ascend, creating a button from the third square.
  • Stand on a green or blue button to give the other hero an ability.
    • Shoot (green) hits enemies at range.
    • Jump (blue) lets you jump onto enemies and over walls.
  • Red and orange buttons are charged when an enemy steps onto them.
    • Step on a charged red button to gain health.
    • Step on a charged orange button gain gold.
  • Ascend to the surface to win.

Inspired by Imbroglio. Thanks to @ramonaisonline for music and sounds 🙏🏻
